content.text: Hi there! I'm from a small town in the Midwest where cookies are a big deal. What about you?
Hi! I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from. I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
That's cool! I love to read books too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love fantasy novels, especially the ones by Brandon Sanderson. I also love historical fiction and biographies.

I've heard good things about Brandon Sanderson. I've never read any of his books, but I'm always looking for new authors to try. I love historical fiction too. What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon and the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about Outlander. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great series.
So what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to a pride parade with my friends. I'm not married, but I'm proud of who I am and I'm excited to show my support for the LGBTQ community.
That's great! I'm glad you're so happy and confident in yourself.
I'm sure you're doing a great job
